title: It works really well and what great crema!
body: However, it takes a lot of effort pumping, and is s bit hard on my thumbs, so i turn it a bit and use my palms and heels of my hands to push the plunger in; Not a deal-breaker, though, becaus it is fantastic espresso! What a treat to know I can take this with me, and as long as I can microwave or stove boil water, that I am guaranteed a great cup of coffee! I have drunk a shot with sugar and heavy cream, which I love! I’ve also used the shot(s) to make mixed espresso drinks, both hot AND cold! Total yumminess! I definitely recommend this portable espresso maker. I purchased the separate Simpresso pod accessory that allows you to not use grounds. It makes the whole process easier to clean! Even though it’s not the best environmental choice, I like the convenience of them. I also purchased the “lungo” accessory, but have not used it yet. It allows you to make a larger shot. You can buy “lungo” pods at most stores… I love the selection at the local Target store!! If uou are even researching hthis item, then you definitely need this espresso maker, so don’t hesitate! This is by far the best one I have used!

date: Revisado en Alemania el 27 de enero de 2024

title: Excellent coffee; good for one or two people.
body:
Makes a lovely double expresso! Better than our Nespresso capsule coffee maker and also one with a plunger. Takes a few minutes longer than the other two but well worth it. The down side is that it does coffees one at a time with opening and emptying in between so not really practical for a dinner party; however, excellent for one or two people, and good on holiday. I imagine also good for hikers and campers providing you have a way of heating water. The instructions advise that you warm the coffee maker before using, but I don't think this is really necessary. Just warm the cup.
When you make the double coffee, you will need both hands and a fair bit of energy to pump it, especially if you use Nespresso type capsules. One last point. When you have filled the double expresso tank it is important to hold it still on a horizontal surface to screw the body of the machine onto it. If you don't, I can tell you from experience that very hot water will escape onto your hands! I have enjoyed using this machine and would thoroughly recommend it.
Price is reasonable for the quality of coffee, and the engineering that went into its manufacture.
author: S. Grundy
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 18 de junio de 2022

title: Always Innovative
body: As I’m actually updating my initial purchase of this product from past usage. It’s always been a great time with the Wacaco products. They are really good for the price and the versatility. In addition to the Nanopresso, it increases the quality to having a double shot of espresso as well as a bigger water tank. Much appreciated for the additional experience.

date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 22 de mayo de 2024

title: One of the best on the market!
body:
I wanted a manual espresso machine, but the only one I could find that would make a true espresso was several £100’s. I bought this thinking it was going to be a bit of a gimmick … how wrong was I!! Excellent quality espresso, easy to use, easy to clean! I have used mine almost every day for the past 2 years! Well over a 1000 espressos made with my minipresso, and it’s still working very well.

I believe the best addition to the standard is the barista kit (double espresso kit!) and I have a manual coffee grinder. I have used the Nespresso pod attachment but this doesn’t work well, the pods are too tightly packed and therefore the minipresso cannot push the water through, and the pressure is released through the pressure relief valve, which then becomes messy and no coffee.

Awesome machine! Favourite gadget of 2020!!
author: Bruce Harrison
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 3 de noviembre de 2021

title: turns camping into glamping!
body:
i am an avid outdoorsman who belives in a minimal life style and was happy to use instant coffee when needed.... then i met my partner in crime. she loves the comfort of home and being outdoors seemed to make her life harder. i adapted and started improving my camping setup to make her life better. (hit and miss as i bought and tested different gear and setups).
the nespresso coffe maker (with the barista kit) changed the game. an early rise with a decent hike to watch the sun rise with fresh coffee from a simple device gave both of us an extra layer of quality. i've gone from camping to glamping and wouldnt look back. (its not what you bring with you that makes it better but who you are with)
author: David Kennedy
date: Revisado en Australia el 19 de febrero de 2021

title: Great upgrade!

title: mejor cafe que muchas cafeteras
body: Me parece un producto genial, estaba cansado de agua de calcetín que llaman café en la oficina así que decidí darle una oportunidad al nanopresso. El café que extrae es muy bueno en sabor y consistencia y la crema es densa, el único detalle es que si es conveniente precalentar las piezas con un par de rondas de agua caliente sin café para que el café final salga con buena tempreatura, si no el resultado es bueno pero no muy caliente. Lo recomiendo como una opción vedadera y portable para hacer un espresso en cualquier momento.

title: Great product

title: Great extension to an already great product
body:
We always take our Nanopresso with us on trips and holidays. It makes a great espresso for such a tiny package. The downside was that it could only deliver a single shot of espresso at a time. You then had to clean the basket, dry the whole thing, refill and tamp the basket, reboil the water, etc. By the time the second shot was done, the first one had gone totally cold.
The Barista Kit solves the "coffee for one" limitation by providing two double-shot baskets, 1 additional single-shot basket, an extension ring to make room for the double-shot basket, and a larger water container. The result is that I can now fill and tamp two baskets. I fill the water container with enough water for two coffees, press the first, replace the basket and press the second. We now have two freshly made espressos (single or double shots depending on the time of day) both nice and hot. Perfect for a globe-trotting couple like us.
author: Bard C. Papegaaij
date: Revisado en Australia el 21 de abril de 2019

title: Incontournable pour le Wacaco Nanopresso
body:
Commandé dans le cadre d'un anniversaire, je suis pleinement satisfait du retour de celui-ci. Mon filleul était ravi.

J'ai pu le tester avec succès le Barista Kit à la fin du repas, celui_ci s'emboitait parfaitement avec le Nanopresso.

Premier retour, on à une régularité de pression avec ce type de modèle de cafetière ce qui permet d'avoir toujours le même café, comme on les aime (dixit mon filleul).

Bref ce kit permet d'obtenir une dose de café correspondant à la taille d'une mug, ce qui n'était pas passible avec le modèle initiale.

Du coup mon filleul qui prend uniquement son café le matin, garde constamment la configuration du Barista Kit. Il m'a juste demandé s'il n'existait pas des rangement spécifique pour l'ensemble des options, cafetière comprise, car il emporte partout sa nanopresso (de sa résidence universitaire en stage ou chez ses grands parents). J'avoue que je n'ai pas su quoi lui répondre.

Je ne regrette pas ce chois car ma commande à été en plus rapidement livrée et très bien emballée par amazon (comme d'habitude).

Nicolas

title: LOVE IT
body:
LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT.
The only cheap way to get a decent home espresso and doppio amd hence a decent hone flat white and other espresso based coffee drinks. Assuming excellent grade frshly roasted coffee beans, this nanopresso creates a beaitifully bodied espresso with a beautiful crema. Works well in barista mode without the pressure button inserted. Manual use allows for personal control and less to go wrong, like with expensive espresso machines that need descaling and servicing, and there is no control over quality with.

title: Game changer in the nanopresso world. A must have!
body:
I literally can’t believe I didn’t get this sooner!
Love the nanopresso but always felt that the single shot that comes with the unit by default, was too small and always found myself going through two shots just for one cup.

The I was surprised to find that it came with its own carry case, an additional double shot and an additional single shot.
So now I have two of each shot size… and they each come with little lids, so you can prefix them if you’re taking the nanopresso out camping, they’re ready to go.

Highly recommend!
author: Tim
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 14 de julio de 2021

title: Indisipensable si compras el Nanopresso
body: Es indispensable si adquieres el Wacaco Nanopresso. Los accesorios que incluye son indispensables para preparar más café sin tener que estar usando el mismo filtro pequeño que trae el Nanopresso original.
author: David
date: Revisado en México el 9 de febrero de 2022

title: MUST have - this should come standard
body:
I think this is a MUST have nanopresso accessory. Frankly it should come standard because the quantity of coffee that you can make without it is quite tiny.

With this kit I've been super happy with my Nanopresso machine. Got it as a Christmas gift and have been using it almost daily on my travels. It's super well designed and actually pretty fun to use. I look forward to the coffee ritual every morning and that "pop" of espresso coming out into my cup.
author: Dmitriy Martynov
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 31 de enero de 2024

title: Watch your settings
body: I am currently using the Nanopresso as a temporary replacement while my home machine makes it's way through the repair process. I take two double lattes to work twice a day, and the one single shot filter basket a complete pain. The barista kit is just the thing I needed, love that they sent two double shot filter baskets and a serviceable little plastic tamper. That said, I use a very fine espresso grind with my home machine and the same grind worked with the single shot basket. With the double baskets, I had to grind a little courser (still an espresso grind) and go a little easier on the tamping. With these settings, I'm still getting a great latte and once I got everything dialed in, the barista kit cut my makeshift latte making time from 22 minutes to 15 minutes.
author: M. Evans
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 12 de junio de 2023

title: Works well but don’t overtighten
body: So far so good after 20 shots. Watch out to not grind too finely or pack too much in. Over tightening won’t help. Stay chill and you’ll end up with a flavorful, crema rich shot.
author: Kindle Customer
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 11 de febrero de 2024

title: Makes excellent espresso!
body: My husband is very pleased with the quality and quantity of the espresso this makes.
author: ranch11gal
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 19 de febrero de 2024

title: What a great addition to the Wacaco Nanopresso
body: Dont leave home without this. You can preload two double shot groups and one single and store in this accessory along with the drinking cup....ready to go. All you need is the hot water and you will have a total of 5 shots (two doubles and a single) of your favorite grind right there in one handy device along with the nanopresso! A must have!
author: daboyv
date: Revisado en Canadá el 3 de julio de 2023

title: Perfect portable coffee fix
body:
If you like espressos and need that fix in the mornings wherever you are, then nanopresso is probably for you.

The espresso you get is probably not as great as the one you could make on an industrial grade machine, however in my experience the taste and quality depend a lot on your grind and tamping. So I've been able to produce some really decent tasting espressos with the nanopresso.

The clear reason for getting this is portability! I keep it in my bag so wherever I go, if I can find some coffee beans I can make an espresso. (I also have a cheap $15 grinder I found on Amazon that's very portable). All you need is a bit of hot water and you can start making espresso!

I bought the barista kit also, it's a great addition because it's super compact and I enjoy the coffee I can make using the double filter basket slightly more than the single basket. Minor thing, but it does make a difference.

I take the nanopresso out with me on camping and hiking trips and theres really nothing else like having an espresso in while taking in some beautiful scenery. It's also super easy to clean, I usually just wipe it down outdoors, then rinse it and let it air dry when I'm home.

Thumbs up from me!
author: Kiran
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 1 de noviembre de 2018

title: Super option
body: Bonne option supplémentaire pour la Wacaco Nanopresso.
author: Louis-David Desrochers
date: Revisado en Canadá el 11 de enero de 2024

title: Lo mejor que he comprado para mis viajes en carro
body: Lo compré porque viajo en mi camioneta y hace el café espresso perfecto esto aumenta la cantidad para mí y mi esposo, lo recomiendo muchísimo
author: Lenia
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 10 de octubre de 2023

title: Makes great espresso, but takes a few uses to get the hang of. (Slow steady pumps is key.)
body:
If you love good espresso and travel or are outdoorsy, then you will love this portable powerless espresso maker.

I mostly use this on a sailboat, where I was unable to have a regular espresso maker due to space and power constraints. I have, however, also packed it when visiting family, and used it as a backup when my home espresso maker broke.

To use, simply add ground coffee to the included portafilter cup, or use a K-Cup with the optional accessory, then fill the cup with hot water. Using slow steady strokes, pump. (You want to avoid pumping too quickly or building up too much pressure). I suggest using this unit at home for a week or so to get the hang of it.

The result is espresso that, with a little extra time and manual labor, is as good as any home machine will make.

Clean up is pretty easy. Take everything apart, dump the coffee grounds and rinse.
author: Matt
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 28 de julio de 2020

title: You get what you pay for!
body: Adventure motorcycle camping is really fun if you have the right equipment. Making and enjoying a good cup of coffee in the morning after a nights sleep in the desert or woods is about as satisfying as it gets. I love this product line. The coffee maker is fun to operate and makes great espresso. The Barista kit adds the ability to make a bigger cup of coffee. I love it! I even have a milk frother for those mornings when I want a cappuccino. Highly recommend.
author: mokezak
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 18 de octubre de 2022

title: Works as if should
body: Compact and makes a good espresso
author: Amazon Customer
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 7 de noviembre de 2023

title: Improves on an already wonderful device.
body: The Wacaco Nanopresso makes pretty darn good espresso. Certainly as good as the green mermaid place. But, the problem is that you can only do a single shot. And it only comes with a single portafilter basket. This add on corrects both issues and comes with a tamper. I haven't used this traveling. I use it at home. But, it means that for less than 100 dollars I get a good enough for me espresso device that complements my Chemex and Aeropress for those times that I want a shot of espresso (or I want to make an espresso drink for friends). If you are organized you can fill two of the double shot portafilter baskets and make two drinks in succession. I recommend 15.5 gr of coffee with 50 gr of boiling water.
author: Matt&Peg
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 22 de marzo de 2021

title: Overpriced by necessary add on to nanopresso
body: It’s over priced. Half the cost of the original unit. Really not a ton to it. But making one shot at a time is a pain. This comes with a bunch of extra filter cups. So you don’t have to wash and dry between servings. And you can do a double shot off the hop. So very useful addition. But definitely overpriced.
author: Ryan V
date: Revisado en Canadá el 30 de junio de 2022

title: I love my nanopresso
body: Being able to make a double shot quickly is amazing, Comes with 2 doubles and a single as well as a tamper. For a beginner in espresso, I am enjoying it!
author: Palwinder sangha
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 6 de julio de 2023

title: Because I'm worth it.
body:
The Nanopresso was a gift to myself after working some overtime, and the Barista kit was a luxury add-on. Your mileage may vary.
I like the extra pods, for the times when I might grind up two or three at a time. I also have a portable grinder, so it's not essential -- and you will carry only one or the other.
I also liked the extra-large water compartment, because that's how I take my espresso in the morning. I suppose it would be useful if you need to share. On the other hand, it's bigger.
And that's the only down-side of the kit. It takes up as much space as the Nanopresso itself. On some trips, that's not worth it. But in most cases, I can find room for things that make my life better.
author: Amazon Customer
date: Revisado en Canadá el 15 de marzo de 2019

title: Utile
body: Indispensable pour un café allongé.
author: Louise d Arcy
date: Revisado en Canadá el 13 de agosto de 2023

title: Great accessory kit, extends the capacity to brew coffee with the nanopresso
body: Perfect for camping, now instead of doing 4 or 6 time the process to get a large cup or morning coffee while camping, I can get the coffee done for me and my wife on only 2, very portable, we can walk on the woods find a nice spot open the camping chairs and enjoy fresh espresso or americanos on a rainy day
author: Christian Zuñiga Ramirez
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 6 de agosto de 2022

title: unfortunately almost necessary but well worth it
body:
Unfortunately the base espresso maker only allows you to make 1 shot of espresso at a time so most coffee lovers almost have to buy this or else spend double the amount of time heating up water and pumping out a shot but it's well worth it.

It comes with 1x single-shot and 2xdouble-shot espresso shot cups for the espresso maker itself, an adapter which expands the room for the double-shot cup to sit within the espresso maker, a larger water reservoir needed to make a double shot, and a larger drinking cup than the single cup included with the base model.

I bought this as well as the base model and carrying case as a birthday gift for my husband since we travel/camp 1-2 a year and he loves it!
author: CN
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 7 de noviembre de 2019

title: Awesome. Essential Nanopresso accessory for double-shot goodness. Don't buy the cheap knockoffs. Nanopresso FTW
body:
Awesome. With this and the Nanopresso, you have the double-shot espresso most of us are used to getting when we order espresso drinks in a coffee shop.

And BTW, the Nanopresso is AMAZING. Makes so much crema. It actually makes better shots than our friends huge and very serious top-of-the-line home espresso machine. (costs like $1,500)

How is this possible? the little nanopresso and its clever pressure-building valve actually puts more pressure through the puck than you can get outside of a real coffee shop.

I never understood how coffee snobs would say "I'm tasting floral notes with these beans" until I got our nanopresso. Amazing, no bitterness, all creamy smoothness and yes, floral notes. A titan in a small package.

Support this company and don't buy the cheap knockoffs. The innovation and quality is excellent.
author: J. Fredrickson
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 14 de junio de 2018

title: A must have for the Nanopresso
body: This kit makes the Nano much more functional. It has 2 double coffee pods, and a larger cup, plus a screw on extension, so you can fit the double pod into the press. So the photo shows the Nano with the kit installed.

body: Beyond how easy is the product to be used, it is the quality and flavor of the coffee yielded along with the outstanding quality of the product. People keeps asking me how it possible they haven't seen this marvel before. Really Wacaco rocks!

title: No te quedes sin tu cafe

title: It gets the job done
body: I travel a lot with work and hate pod system taste, this allows me to bring quality espresso with me anywhere and get a great cup. Produces lots of frothy crema, easy to use and clean. Built good and Is durable. I will say you got to want it some mornings because it takes a decent amount of pumping for the double shot. But it is well worth the effort once you’re done.

title: Great product
body: I love it, it makes better espresso than my espresso machine, I highly recommend it ⚡️👍🏻
author: Milenko
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 6 de mayo de 2023

title: Barista kit is a near-critical add-on and is easy to use
body: The barista kit is a critical add-on for me. Without it, I’d spend till noon filling and refilling the tiny single cups to get enough espresso for my travel partners and myself. Another add-on for me is a small propane stove so I can always heat water and milk for lattes & cappuccinos anywhere, even a roadside pull out. Of course, a microwave is much easier and quicker if convenient. The barista kit actually probably requires less skill to use than the standard kit alone. It’s way quicker at putting out many doubles for extra people, etc.
author: Thomas L. Doering
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 24 de marzo de 2020

title: Fresh espresso on the go
body: Easy to use and a quality build. I like the strong flavour it produces, for espressos, lungos, and even over ice. The extra baskets in this kit and the larger tank provide lots of flexibility.
author: DaveM
date: Revisado en Canadá el 11 de febrero de 2022

title: Love coffee? You won't regret this purchase.
body: Awesome product with a great design. The espresso you pull from this little device is actually shockingly good. This was a gift for my partner who used to work as a barista and it did not disappoint. I'd highly recommend. The only down side is you have to have hot water available, but this isn't too much of a hassle. The upside to that is your shots always have full body and never tasted burned. The coffee trastes and looks like its worth every penny.
author: Amazon Customer
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 16 de enero de 2021

title: Best choice as an add on.
body: Durable, travels well. Pods great size to equal water container volume giving robust brew strength with lots of crema. Bought a 2nd unit as a backup. My wife likes this better than our big machine!
